channel.title: Justin Bieber as Robin
channel.description: Justin Bieber could be play as Robin. On the next Man of Steel 2, or Batman vs Superman. [url='https://metro.co.uk/2013/09/15/justin-bieber-hints-at-robin-role-in-batman-v-superman-4011370/']https://metro.co.uk/2013/09/15/justin-bieber-hints-at-robin-role-in-batman-v-superman-4011370/[/url]

item.title: Justin Bieber as Robin
item.dc:creator: Dr_Perky
item.description:
Only issue with this is if it is as the script in the piucture suggests based on Dark Knight Falls then Robin is Carrie Kelley who is not a boy although he does look like he could play her.

Read full topic

item.title: Justin Bieber as Robin
item.dc:creator: Flatline
item.description:
Yeah, a) it’s almost certainly not true and not worth getting your panties in a twist and b) he can act at least reasonably well, as evidenced in that CSI episode (the full one, not the endlessly shot bit linked above) and until you see it on the screen NO-ONE knows how good or bad he’ll be.

Read full topic

item.title: Justin Bieber as Robin
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
What about option D-

He bombs, sucks dick at acting and makes a fool of himself. Entertainment value skyrockets at his expense, and his embarrassment is so great he commits seppuku from the shame.

Read full topic

item.title: Justin Bieber as Robin
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
would be interesting. I’d watch it just to see how he tries to act. Worst case, he’s really bad and it’s fucking hilarious and leaves a huge mark on his career which in its own right is okay. Best case, he’s so good he stops singing.

So if we take a step back:

A ) He bombs, sucks dick at acting and makes a fool of himself. Entertainment value skyrockets and makes for great brovernight viewings.

B ) He’s amazing and makes something of himself other than a walking commercial.

C) He’s okay and… well, that’s okay.

Read full topic

item.title: Justin Bieber as Robin

item.description:
^ To shoot themselves in the foot with their male audience?

In all honesty, I’d find it hilarious.

item.title: Justin Bieber as Robin
item.dc:creator: Chickenprotector
item.description:
TheeGoatPig:

You are one of five people that believed his tweet. Everyone else is calling him out on his bullshit.

I’d call bullshit too. There may be some proof, but unless it’s seen from a credible source (The fucking PR team for the movie itself) I won’t believe it.

Read full topic

item.title: Justin Bieber as Robin

item.description:

You are one of five people that believed his tweet. Everyone else is calling him out on his bullshit.

Dude, I don’t even use Twitter, Facebook, or Instagram no offence. But if it turns out to be true. I would go apeshit!
